heroBanner.heading: UNLOCKED
heroBanner.description: Ready to put your skills to the test? Join our team of data scientists on a mission to outsmart powerful forces—and uncover the truth about an ancient & invaluable cure.

secondaryBanner.label: Discover the power of Z by HP
secondaryBanner.heading: Z by HP workstations: Tailor-made for data scientists
secondaryBanner.body:
Z by HP workstations are designed to help data scientists meet the demands of massive datasets. Whether you’re training models, creating complex visualizations or handling advanced algorithms, there’s a ZBook or Z desktop engineered for your next breakthrough.

Select Z workstations come preloaded with the data science software you need, so you’re ready from day one. Begin the challenges for your chance to win.

tertiaryBanner.heading: Play for a chance to win 1 of 10 HP ZBook Studios & a trip to the Kaggle Days x Z by HP World Championship in Barcelona*
tertiaryBanner.description: Play the data science challenges for a chance to win your dream workstation and a trip of a lifetime.
tertiaryBanner.caption: *See terms & conditions¹

modal.heading: Unlocked Sweepstakes
modal.description: Complete the challenge and test your data science skills. Fill out the form in the challenge pages and you will receive one entry into the sweepstakes. All winnners will be decided after the sweepstakes ends on April 30. To be eligible to play, you must reside in United States, United Kingdom, Canada (excluding Quebec), Japan, Germany, Austria, India, Netherlands, Sweden or Switzerland.

grandPrize.title: A trip to the Kaggle Days x Z by HP World Championship in Barcelona

secondaryPrize.title: An HP ZBook Studio preloaded with the data science software stack

footer.labelBegin: *NO PURCHASE NECESSARY. A purchase will not increase your chances of winning. Promotion begins at 12:00 PM ET on February 7, 2022 and ends at 11:59:59 PM ET on April 30, 2022. Open only to legal residents of 50 US/DC, Canada (excl Quebec), India, Japan, Germany, South Korea, United Kingdom, Sweden, Netherlands, Austria, or Switzerland, 18+ years of age or age of majority in his/her jurisdiction.
footer.labelEnd: , including how to enter, odds, prize details and restrictions. 1 Grand Prize trip available (valued at $13,645.99 USD) and 9 First Prize computers (valued at $5,895.99 USD each). Skill-testing question required for Canadian winners. Void where prohibited. Msg&data rates may apply. Sponsor: HP Inc., 1501 Page Mill Road, Palo Alto, CA 94304, USA.

description.title: Data Visualization
description.body:
Damone is helping Michaela create a data visualization on global deforestation patterns, but he’s run into some trouble. How would you solve the challenge?

Use your data science skills to complete the visualization. If you get stuck, Ken Jee is here to help with a tutorial walkthrough.

When you’re ready, submit your answers in the form below to continue your journey and enter into the sweepstakes. Consider this a golden opportunity to show us what you’re made of!

challengeCompleted.title: Challenge completed. Nice work!
challengeCompleted.description: You’ve completed the first challenge and earned one entry into the sweepstakes. Continue unlocking the mystery for more chances to win!

socialShare.description: Share this badge of completion to show that you aced the challenge.
socialShare.caption: * Terms and Conditions

description.title: Natural Language Processing
description.body:
The only clues Michaela & Damone have on Eva’s whereabouts are a few key words. They've scoured the internet for relevant articles, but there’s just too much information to process quickly.

Use your NLP skills to build a topic model that will answer the mystery of who or what La Eterna is—and remember, Ken Jee is here to help with a tutorial walkthrough if you need a little assistance.

When you’re ready, submit your answers in the form below to continue your journey and enter into the sweepstakes. Consider this a golden opportunity to show us what you’re made of!

challengeCompleted.title: Challenge completed. Nice work!
challengeCompleted.description: You’ve completed the second challenge and earned one entry into the sweepstakes. Continue unlocking the mystery for more chances to win!

socialShare.description: Share this badge of completion to show that you aced the challenge.
socialShare.caption: * Terms and Conditions

description.title: Audio Analysis
description.body:
Michaela, Damone & Eva need to pinpoint the place where a certain bird population is most dense. This is a critical point in their journey, and the clock is ticking.

Use your data science skills to analyze these audio files and identify which areas of the forest have the greatest density of capuchinbirds. Tip: Your viz from Challenge 1 may prove helpful.

Remember, Ken Jee is here to help with a tutorial walkthrough if you need a little assistance.

When you’re ready, submit your answers in the form below to continue your journey and enter into the sweepstakes. Consider this a golden opportunity to show us what you’re made of!

challengeCompleted.description: You’ve completed the third challenge and earned one entry into the sweepstakes. Continue unlocking the mystery for more chances to win!

socialShare.description: Share this badge of completion to show that you aced the challenge.
socialShare.caption: * Terms and Conditions

description.title: Image Analysis
description.body:
This is no time for giving up—our data science heroes are on the brink of unlocking the truth!

In this final challenge, you’ll need to build a model to classify whether any given flower can be considered La Eterna or not. Once we identify an image on social media, whoever posted it might lead us to the source.

Don’t forget, Ken Jee is here with tutorial assistance if needed. Good luck!

When you’re ready, submit your answers in the form below to continue your journey and enter into the sweepstakes. Consider this a golden opportunity to show us what you’re made of!

challengeCompleted.description: Well done! You’ve completed the fourth and final challenge and earned one last entry into the sweepstakes.

socialShare.description: Share this badge of completion to show that you aced the challenge.
socialShare.caption: * Terms and Conditions
